select h.hotel_no, H.hotel_name, H.hotel_content, H.hotel_tel, H.hotel_zip_code, H.hotel_basic_addr, H.hotel_title, H.hotel_star,H.hotel_parking, H.hotel_fitness,H.hotel_pool,H.hotel_sauna,H.hotel_lounge,H.hotel_bbq,H.hotel_cafe,H.hotel_convenience_store,H.hotel_karaoke,H.hotel_internet, count(R.room_name) room_cnt, min(R.room_price) min_price, max(R.room_price) max_price, max(R.room_people) max_people, E.seller_blacklist from hotel H inner join Room R on H.hotel_no = R.hotel_no inner join seller E on H.seller_no = E.seller_no left outer join reserve S on R.room_no = S.reserve_room_no where R.room_people >= #{people} and (reserve_in >= to_date(#{check_out}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') or
reserve_out <= to_date(#{check_in}, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
or reserve_in is null or reserve_out is null)
group by h.hotel_no, H.hotel_name, H.hotel_content, H.hotel_tel, H.hotel_zip_code, H.hotel_basic_addr, H.hotel_title, H.hotel_star,H.hotel_parking, H.hotel_fitness, H.hotel_pool,H.hotel_sauna,H.hotel_lounge,H.hotel_bbq,H.hotel_cafe,H.hotel_convenience_store,H.hotel_karaoke,H.hotel_internet, E.seller_blacklist having H.hotel_basic_addr like '%' || #{region} || '%' and

H.hotel_fitness = 'Y' and

H.hotel_sauna = 'Y' and
H.hotel_lounge = 'Y' and
H.hotel_bbq = 'Y' and
H.hotel_cafe = 'Y' and
H.hotel_convenience_store = 'Y' and
H.hotel_karaoke = 'Y' and
